fields.request_details:
1. Visit the Charge Point Simulator page on the public site.
2. Resize to a desktop viewport and confirm the simulator fields appear in three columns with the start/stop controls, status, and details stacked in a fourth column on the right.
3. Resize to a narrow viewport and verify the action column stacks below the fields without clipping or overlap.
4. Run a brief start/stop cycle to confirm the controls remain functional and status updates appear in the action column.
